rooms.description: Large entrance with wheelchair accessible ramp and reception area.
Spacious living room with large windows for natural light and cross ventilation; connected to balcony access.
Adjacent dining space integrated within the living area, designed for flexibility and wheelchair accessibility.
Functional kitchen with accessible design including lower countertops, ample storage; positioned near north-east following Vastu guidelines.
A guest bedroom located adjacent to the living area for privacy and accessibility. Features a balcony for ventilation.
Master bedroom with additional space for en-suite bathroom; designed with ample natural light from east-facing windows.
Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom, offering a serene view and cross ventilation.
